quests.name: The Ghost Ship of Anvil
quests.description: Varulae needs you to recover her crystal ball from the haunted ship.

quests.name: The Siren's Deception
quests.description: An all-female gang of thieves is preying on married men in the town.

quests.name: Caught in the Hunt
quests.description: Ursanne Loche's husband is missing!

quests.name: The Forlorn Watchman
quests.description: Lay to rest the spirit of a former sailor.

quests.name: Through A Nightmare, Darkly
quests.description: Help Kud-Ei from the Bravil Mages Guild save her missing friend.

quests.name: A Brotherhood Betrayed
quests.description: It appears that a vampire in town was recently killed by Raynil Dralas, a self-proclaimed vampire hunter.

quests.name: Lifting the Vale
quests.description: Countess Narina Carvain wants you to find the Draconian Madstone.

quests.name: Two Sides of the Coin
quests.description: Arnora wants you to speak with Jorundr to find out where their stolen gold is hidden.

quests.name: A Brush with Death
quests.description: Help a distraught wife find a famous painter who has gone missing.

quests.name: Corruption and Conscience
quests.description: The Captain of the Guard in Cheydinhal is corrupt and the citizens want him removed.

quests.name: Separated at Birth
quests.description: Investigate rumors around Chorrol that indicate some strange behavior on the part of one Reynald Jemane.

quests.name: Legacy Lost
quests.description: Help long-lost twins recover their childhood home.

quests.name: Sins of the Father
quests.description: A thief wants you to recover an item stolen by the Jemane brothers' father.

quests.name: The Killing Field
quests.description: Valus Odiil in The Grey Mare in Chorrol needs you to help his sons reclaim his besieged farm.

quests.name: A Shadow Over Hackdirt
quests.description: Seed-Neeus' daughter Dar-Ma has gone missing.

quests.name: Canvas the Castle
quests.description: Someone has stolen a valuable painting from Castle Chorrol!

quests.name: Knights of the White Stallion
quests.description: Join this Knightly order by killing a notorious bandit.

quests.name: Mazoga the Orc
quests.description: Count Marius Caro is concerned about Mazoga, an Orc at Castle Leyawiin who claims to be a knight.

quests.name: Raid on Greyland
quests.description: Help the Leyawiin Guard get rid of a drug trafficker.

quests.name: Tears of the Savior
quests.description: S'drassa of the Leyawiin Mages Guild is looking for Garridan's Tears.

quests.name: Whom Gods Annoy
quests.description: Rosentia Gallenus has been plagued by a foul smelling odor and some unusual house guests.

quests.name: Paranoia
quests.description: Help a paranoid Wood Elf with his conspiracy woes.

quests.name: Seeking Your Roots
quests.description: After discovering a peculiar plant called Nirnroot, you decide to investigate it further.
